steps.name: Given User launches the Flipkart website in respective "edge" environment
When User searches for the "iphone 16 pro max" in the Search bar.
Then User select the "Apple iPhone 16 Pro Max (Desert Titanium, 256 GB)" from the search results.

steps.name: And User switches the tab for the product detail page.
And User click on Add to Bag
Then User verifies that "Apple iPhone 16 Pro Max (Desert Titanium, 256 GB)" displayed in the cart.

parameters.name: productName
parameters.value: Apple iPhone 16 Pro Max (Desert Titanium, 256 GB)
